################################################################################
# San Diego Vape Retailer Interactive Map Application
# 
# This application visualizes vape retailers across San Diego County
# along with various demographic and policy data layers.
################################################################################

#==============================================================================
# SETUP AND CONFIGURATION
#==============================================================================

# ---- Load Required Libraries ----
library(tigris)       # For accessing geographic data
library(leaflet)      # For interactive maps
library(sf)           # For handling spatial data
library(dplyr)        # For data manipulation
library(scales)       # For formatting numbers
library(htmltools)    # For HTML generation
library(readxl)       # For reading Excel files
library(htmlwidgets)  # For widget customization
library(RColorBrewer) # For color palettes
library(lubridate)    # For date handling

# Configure tigris package settings
options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)  # Cache geographic data for faster loading
options(tigris_class = "sf")      # Return spatial data as sf objects

# ---- File Paths ----
retailer_path <- "Finalized E-commerce Vape Shops After Filtering B&C.xlsx"
zipcode_path <- "normalized_SE_sf.shp"
flavor_ban_path <- "Final_Flavor_Shp_File/CA_Flavor_Ban_ED.shp"

#==============================================================================
# HELPER FUNCTIONS
#==============================================================================

# Replace -999 values with NA (common placeholder for missing data)
replace_neg999 <- function(x) {
  x <- as.numeric(x)
  x[x == -999] <- NA
  return(x)
}

# Ensure percentage values are between 0 and 100
clean_percentage <- function(x) {
  pmin(pmax(replace_neg999(x), 0), 100)
}

# Format values based on field type for popups and tooltips
format_field <- function(value, field_name) {
  if (field_name == "MdnHHnc") {
    return(paste0("$", comma(value)))
  } else if (field_name %in% c("White", "AfrcnAm", "NativAm", "OthrMlt", "PovrtyP", "Hispanc", "SDI_scr")) {
    return(paste0(round(value, 1), "%"))
  } else if (field_name == "YouthProp") {
    return(percent(value, accuracy = 0.1))
  } else {
    return(round(value, 3))
  }
}

# Add a thematic layer to the map with consistent formatting
add_thematic_layer <- function(map, data, field, palette_func, group_name, label) {
  map %>%
    addPolygons(
      data = data,
      fillColor = ~palette_func(data[[field]]),
      color = "white",
      weight = 0.5,
      fillOpacity = 0.8,
      popup = ~paste0("<b>", label, ":</b> ", format_field(data[[field]], field)),
      group = group_name,
      options = pathOptions(pane = "polygons")
    ) %>%
    hideGroup(group_name)  # Hide thematic layers by default
}

# Create consistent popup content for retailer markers
create_popup_content <- function(retailer) {
  content <- paste0(
    "<div style='min-width: 200px;'>",
    "<b>Name:</b> ", retailer$name, "<br>"
  )
  
  # Add website link if available
  if (!is.na(retailer$website)) {
    content <- paste0(content, "<b>Website:</b> <a href='", retailer$website, "' target='_blank'>", retailer$website, "</a><br>")
  }
  
  # Add Google Maps link if available
  if (!is.na(retailer$place_url)) {
    content <- paste0(content, "<b>Google Maps:</b> <a href='", retailer$place_url, "' target='_blank'>View on Google Maps</a><br>")
  }
  
  # Add Yelp link if available
  if (!is.na(retailer$yelp_url)) {
    content <- paste0(content, "<b>Yelp:</b> <a href='", retailer$yelp_url, "' target='_blank'>View on Yelp</a><br>")
  }

  # Add online sales information
  # Use a variable to safely access the column with spaces in the name
  col_website_online <- "Do they have a website listed that allows you to buy vaping products online? (Allows for mail delivery, curbside pick up orders, etc.)"

  if (retailer[[col_website_online]] == 1) {
    content <- paste0(content, "<b>Online Sales:</b> Yes<br>")
  } else {
    content <- paste0(content, "<b>Online Sales:</b> No<br>")
  }
  
  content <- paste0(content, "</div>")
  return(content)
}

#==============================================================================
# DATA LOADING AND PREPARATION
#==============================================================================

# Disable S2 spherical geometry (used for handling features that cross the antimeridian)
sf_use_s2(FALSE)

#--------------------------------------
# Load Geographic Base Data
#--------------------------------------

# Load San Diego County boundary
county_boundary <- counties(state = "CA", cb = TRUE, class = "sf") %>%
  filter(NAME == "San Diego") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 4326)  # Transform to WGS84 coordinates

# Load zipcode data (which contains demographic info)
zipcode_data <- st_read(zipcode_path) %>%
  filter(County == "San Diego") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 4326)

#--------------------------------------
# Clean and Transform Demographic Data
#--------------------------------------

# Prepare demographic data with calculated fields
sd_county_data <- zipcode_data %>%
  mutate(
    MdnHHnc = as.numeric(MdnHHnc),
    NnHspnW = as.numeric(NnHspnW),
    # Calculate youth proportion (under 21 divided by total population)
    YouthProp = ifelse(TotPp19 > 0, PpltU21 / TotPp19, NA_real_),
    # Log transform population for visualization
    LogTotPp19 = ifelse(!is.na(TotPp19) & TotPp19 > 0, log10(TotPp19), NA_real_),
    # Clean up invalid values
    TotPp19 = ifelse(TotPp19 <= 0, NA, TotPp19),
    MdnHHnc = ifelse(MdnHHnc < 0, NA, MdnHHnc),
    # Clean percentage fields
    Hispanc = clean_percentage(Hispanc),
    White = clean_percentage(White),
    AfrcnAm = clean_percentage(AfrcnAm),
    NativAm = clean_percentage(NativAm),
    OthrMlt = clean_percentage(OthrMlt),
    PovrtyP = clean_percentage(PovrtyP)
  )

# Set map boundaries and zoom levels
sd_bounds <- st_bbox(county_boundary)
min_zoom <- 7
max_zoom <- 30
padding_factor <- 0.2  # Add padding around the county boundary

#--------------------------------------
# Load and Prepare Retailer Data
#--------------------------------------

# Define column names with spaces for consistent reference
col_confirms_vape <- "Can you confirm that this shop sells vaping products from the yelp or google maps urls or from its website?"
col_website_online <- "Do they have a website listed that allows you to buy vaping products online? (Allows for mail delivery, curbside pick up orders, etc.)"

# Load retailer data and clean up
retailer_data <- read_excel(retailer_path) %>%
  mutate(
    # Create a consolidated name field
    name = coalesce(place_name, yelp_name),
    # Create consolidated fields for links and references
    website = coalesce(`place_website (hyperlinked)`, place_website, `yelp_website (hyperlinked)`, yelp_website),
    place_url = coalesce(`place_url (hyperlinked)`, place_url),
    yelp_url = coalesce(`yelp_url (hyperlinked)`, yelp_url),
    # Ensure lat/lon are numeric
    lat = as.numeric(lat),
    lon = as.numeric(lon)
  ) %>%
  filter(!is.na(lon) & !is.na(lat))  # Remove entries without coordinates

# Filter confirmed vape retailers and categorize by online sales capability
vape_retailers <- retailer_data %>%
  filter(!!sym(col_confirms_vape) == 1) %>%
  mutate(has_website = !!sym(col_website_online) == 1)

# Split retailers by online sales capability
vape_only_retailers <- vape_retailers %>% filter(!has_website)
vape_online_retailers <- vape_retailers %>% filter(has_website)

#--------------------------------------
# Load and Prepare Flavor Ban Data
#--------------------------------------

# Try to load flavor ban data, with error handling if file doesn't exist
flavor_ban <- tryCatch({
  st_read(flavor_ban_path)
}, error = function(e) {
  warning("Flavor ban data not available. Skipping flavor ban layer.")
  return(NULL)
})

# Clean up flavor ban data if available
if (!is.null(flavor_ban)) {
  flavor_ban <- flavor_ban %>%
    filter(!COASTAL %in% c("bay", "ocean")) %>%  # Remove water features
    st_transform(4326) %>%                       # Transform to WGS84
    mutate(
      ban_status = ifelse(is.na(FB_Effecti), "No Ban", "Ban Effective"),
      COUNTY = as.character(COUNTY),
      PLACE_NAME = as.character(PLACE_NAME),
      ban_status = as.character(ban_status)
    )

  # Filter for San Diego County and ensure valid geometries
  flavor_ban_sd <- flavor_ban %>%
    filter(COUNTY == "San Diego County") %>%
    st_make_valid()

  # Separate counties and cities (different ban jurisdictions)
  counties <- flavor_ban_sd %>% filter(PLACE_NAME == COUNTY)
  cities <- flavor_ban_sd %>% filter(PLACE_NAME != COUNTY)

  # Define color palettes for ban status
  pal_counties <- colorFactor(palette = c("#A5D6A7"), domain = "Ban Effective")
  pal_cities <- colorFactor(palette = c("#228B22", "#C62828"), domain = c("No Ban", "Ban Effective"))
}

#==============================================================================
# MAP VISUALIZATION SETUP
#==============================================================================

#--------------------------------------
# Define Marker Icons
#--------------------------------------

# Blue markers for all vape retailers
blueIcon <- icons(
  iconUrl = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pointhi/leaflet-color-markers/master/img/marker-icon-blue.png",
  iconWidth = 20, iconHeight = 32,
  iconAnchorX = 10, iconAnchorY = 32,
  popupAnchorX = 0, popupAnchorY = -30
)

# Red markers for online retailers
redIcon <- icons(
  iconUrl = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pointhi/leaflet-color-markers/master/img/marker-icon-red.png",
  iconWidth = 20, iconHeight = 32,
  iconAnchorX = 10, iconAnchorY = 32,
  popupAnchorX = 0, popupAnchorY = -30
)

#--------------------------------------
# Build Base Map with Panes
#--------------------------------------

map <- leaflet(options = leafletOptions(
  preferCanvas = TRUE,  # Improves performance for many markers
  minZoom = min_zoom,
  maxZoom = max_zoom,
  maxBounds = list(
    list(sd_bounds[2] - padding_factor, sd_bounds[1] - padding_factor),
    list(sd_bounds[4] + padding_factor, sd_bounds[3] + padding_factor)
  )
)) %>%
  # Add base tile layer
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  # Create map panes for layering control (higher zIndex = on top)
  addMapPane("retailers", zIndex = 420) %>%
  addMapPane("polygons", zIndex = 410) %>%
  addMapPane("boundary", zIndex = 415) %>%
  addMapPane("flavor_ban", zIndex = 412)

# Add empty legend container (will be filled dynamically)
map <- map %>%
  addControl(
    html = "<div id='legend' style='background:white;padding:10px;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);'></div>",
    position = "bottomleft"
  )

#--------------------------------------
# Add Thematic Layers
#--------------------------------------

# Configure all thematic layers with consistent settings
layer_config <- list(
  list(id = "sdi", name = "Social Deprivation Index", field = "SDI_scr", palette = "RdPu", label = "Social Deprivation Index"),
  list(id = "poverty", name = "Poverty Index", field = "PovrtyP", palette = "YlOrBr", label = "Poverty Index"),
  list(id = "income", name = "Median Household Income", field = "MdnHHnc", palette = "YlGnBu", label = "Median Household Income"),
  list(id = "youth", name = "Youth Proportion (Under 21)", field = "YouthProp", palette = "PuBuGn", label = "Youth Proportion (Under 21)"),
  list(id = "white", name = "Percent White", field = "White", palette = "Greens", label = "Percent White"),
  list(id = "black", name = "Percent African American", field = "AfrcnAm", palette = "OrRd", label = "Percent African American"),
  list(id = "native", name = "Percent Native American", field = "NativAm", palette = "Reds", label = "Percent Native American"),
  list(id = "other", name = "Percent Other/Multiracial", field = "OthrMlt", palette = "BuGn", label = "Percent Other/Multiracial")
)

# Store palette and label information for JavaScript access
palette_lookup <- list()
label_lookup <- list()

# Add each thematic layer to the map
for (cfg in layer_config) {
  # Create appropriate color palette based on field type
  palette_func <- if (cfg$field %in% c("White", "AfrcnAm", "NativAm", "OthrMlt", "PovrtyP", "SDI_scr")) {
    colorNumeric(cfg$palette, domain = c(0, 100))
  } else {
    colorNumeric(cfg$palette, domain = range(sd_county_data[[cfg$field]], na.rm = TRUE))
  }
  
  # Store palette for legend creation
  palette_lookup[[cfg$name]] <- palette_func
  label_lookup[[cfg$name]] <- cfg$label
  
  # Add layer to map (hidden by default)
  map <- add_thematic_layer(map, sd_county_data, cfg$field, palette_func, cfg$name, cfg$label)
}

#--------------------------------------
# Add County Boundary
#--------------------------------------

map <- map %>%
  addPolylines(
    data = county_boundary,
    color = "#888888",
    weight = 1.5,
    opacity = 0.8,
    group = "San Diego Border",
    options = pathOptions(pane = "boundary")
  )

#--------------------------------------
# Add Flavor Ban Layers (if available)
#--------------------------------------

if (!is.null(flavor_ban)) {
  # Create separate map panes for layering
  map <- map %>%
    addMapPane("flavor_ban_county", zIndex = 411) %>% # Lower z-index for county (unincorporated)
    addMapPane("flavor_ban_cities", zIndex = 413)     # Higher z-index for cities (incorporated)

  # Add counties (unincorporated areas) FIRST - so they're on bottom
  if (nrow(counties) > 0) {
    map <- map %>%
      addPolygons(
        data = counties,
        fillColor = ~pal_counties(ban_status),
        weight = 0.5,          # Reduced border weight
        color = "#555555",     # Lighter border color
        fillOpacity = 0.5,
        popup = ~paste0("<b>County (Unincorporated):</b> ", COUNTY, "<br>Status: ", ban_status),
        group = "Flavor Ban",
        options = pathOptions(pane = "flavor_ban_county")
      )
  }

  # Add cities (incorporated areas) SECOND - so they're on top
  if (nrow(cities) > 0) {
    map <- map %>%
      addPolygons(
        data = cities,
        fillColor = ~pal_cities(ban_status),
        weight = 0.5,          # Reduced border weight
        color = "#555555",     # Lighter border color
        fillOpacity = 0.7,
        popup = ~paste0(
          "<b>City:</b> ", PLACE_NAME,
          "<br>Status: ", ban_status,
          ifelse(!is.na(FB_Effecti), paste0("<br>Ban Date: ", FB_Effecti), "")
        ),
        group = "Flavor Ban",
        options = pathOptions(pane = "flavor_ban_cities")
      )
  }

  # Hide flavor ban layer by default
  map <- map %>% hideGroup("Flavor Ban")

  # Add Policy Clarification Note (hidden by default)
  flavor_ban_note <- tags$div(
    id = "flavor_ban_note",
    style = "display:none; background:white; padding:8px; border-radius:6px; font-size:13px; box-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); max-width:280px;",
    tags$b("Note:"), " Incorporated cities in San Diego County may opt out of county bans. The county ban applies only to unincorporated areas unless a city passes its own ordinance."
  )

  map <- map %>% addControl(html = HTML(as.character(flavor_ban_note)), position = "topright")
}

#--------------------------------------
# Add Retailer Markers
#--------------------------------------

# Create popup content for all retailers
popups <- lapply(1:nrow(vape_retailers), function(i) {
  create_popup_content(vape_retailers[i,])
})

# Add all vape retailers layer (blue markers)
map <- map %>%
  addMarkers(
    data = vape_retailers,
    ~lon, ~lat,
    icon = blueIcon,
    popup = popups,
    group = "All Vape Retailers",
    options = pathOptions(pane = "retailers"),
    popupOptions = popupOptions(offset = c(0, -30))
  )

# Add online retailers layer (red markers)
map <- map %>%
  addMarkers(
    data = vape_online_retailers,
    ~lon, ~lat,
    icon = redIcon,
    popup = lapply(1:nrow(vape_online_retailers), function(i) {
      create_popup_content(vape_online_retailers[i,])
    }),
    group = "Online Vape Retailers",
    options = pathOptions(pane = "retailers"),
    popupOptions = popupOptions(offset = c(0, -30))
  )

#==============================================================================
# USER INTERFACE ENHANCEMENTS
#==============================================================================

#--------------------------------------
# Create Layer Control Panel
#--------------------------------------

# Build HTML sidebar for layer controls
layer_panel_html <- tags$div(
  class = "layer-panel",
  style = "background:white; padding:10px; border-radius:5px; box-shadow:0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); max-height:400px; overflow-y:auto; font-size:14px;",
  
  # Retailer layers section
  tags$details(open = TRUE,
    tags$summary("RETAILERS"),
    tags$div(
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "all_retailers_layer", checked = TRUE), " All Retailers"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "online_retailers_layer", checked = FALSE), " Online Retailers (Red)")
    )
  ),
  
  # Flavor ban section (if data is available)
  if (!is.null(flavor_ban)) {
    tags$details(open = FALSE,
      tags$summary("FLAVOR BAN STATUS"),
      tags$div(
        tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "flavor_ban_layer"), " Flavor Ban")
      )
    )
  },
  
  # Race/ethnicity layers section
  tags$details(open = FALSE,
    tags$summary("RACE/ETHNICITY PERCENTAGE"),
    tags$div(
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_white"), " White"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_black"), " African American"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_native"), " Native American"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_other"), " Other/Multiracial")
    )
  ),
  
  # Age distribution section
  tags$details(open = FALSE,
    tags$summary("AGE DISTRIBUTION"),
    tags$div(
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_youth"), " Youth Proportion (Under 21)")
    )
  ),
  
  # Socioeconomic indicators section
  tags$details(open = FALSE,
    tags$summary("SOCIOECONOMIC INDICATORS"),
    tags$div(
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_sdi"), " Social Deprivation Index"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_poverty"), " Poverty Index"), tags$br(),
      tags$label(tags$input(type = "checkbox", id = "layer_income"), " Median Household Income")
    )
  )
)


#--------------------------------------
# Add Interactive Controls and JavaScript
#--------------------------------------

# Add sidebar panel and implement JavaScript for dynamic layer control and legend
map <- map %>%
  addControl(html = HTML(as.character(layer_panel_html)), position = "topright") %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("
  function(el, x) {
    var map = this;
    
    // ---- Configuration Data ----
    
    // Map layer IDs to display names
    var layerMap = {
      'all_retailers_layer': 'All Vape Retailers',
      'online_retailers_layer': 'Online Vape Retailers',
      'flavor_ban_layer': 'Flavor Ban',
      'layer_white': 'Percent White',
      'layer_black': 'Percent African American',
      'layer_native': 'Percent Native American',
      'layer_other': 'Percent Other/Multiracial',
      'layer_youth': 'Youth Proportion (Under 21)',
      'layer_sdi': 'Social Deprivation Index',
      'layer_poverty': 'Poverty Index',
      'layer_income': 'Median Household Income'
    };
    
    // Color palette mapping for demographic layers
    var paletteMap = {
      'Percent White': 'Greens',
      'Percent African American': 'OrRd',
      'Percent Native American': 'Reds',
      'Percent Other/Multiracial': 'BuGn',
      'Youth Proportion (Under 21)': 'PuBuGn',
      'Social Deprivation Index': 'RdPu',
      'Poverty Index': 'YlOrBr',
      'Median Household Income': 'YlGnBu'
    };
    
    // ---- Helper Functions ----
    
    /**
     * Returns CSS gradient string for the specified color palette
     * @param {string} palette - The name of the color palette
     * @return {string} CSS gradient string or empty string if palette not found
     */
    function getColorRamp(palette) {
      var colors = {
        'Greens': ['#e5f5e0', '#31a354'],
        'OrRd': ['#fee8c8', '#e34a33'],
        'Reds': ['#fee0d2', '#de2d26'],
        'BuGn': ['#e5f5f9', '#2ca25f'],
        'PuBuGn': ['#ece2f0', '#1c9099'],
        'RdPu': ['#fde0dd', '#c51b8a'],
        'YlOrBr': ['#fff7bc', '#d95f0e'],
        'YlGnBu': ['#edf8b1', '#2c7fb8']
      };
      
      if (colors[palette]) {
        return 'linear-gradient(to right, ' + colors[palette][0] + ', ' + colors[palette][1] + ')';
      }
      return '';
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates legend for demographic layers
     * @param {string} layerName - The name of the active layer
     */
    function updateLegend(layerName) {
      var legendDiv = document.getElementById('legend');
      if (!legendDiv) return;
      
      var palette = paletteMap[layerName];
      if (!palette) {
        legendDiv.innerHTML = '';
        return;
      }
      
      var gradient = getColorRamp(palette);
      var label = layerName;
      
      legendDiv.innerHTML = '<div style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; padding: 8px 12px; background: white; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); min-width: 140px;\">' +
        '<div style=\"font-weight:600; font-size:14px; margin-bottom:6px;\">' + label + '</div>' +
        '<div style=\"height: 10px; width: 100%; background:' + gradient + '; border-radius: 5px; margin-bottom: 6px;\"></div>' +
        '<div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; font-size:11px; color:#555;\">' +
        '<span>Low</span><span>High</span>' +
        '</div>' +
        '</div>';
    }
    
    /**
     * Checks if a layer ID represents a thematic (choropleth) layer
     * @param {string} id - Layer ID to check
     * @return {boolean} True if thematic layer
     */
    function isThematicLayer(id) {
      return id.startsWith('layer_') || id === 'flavor_ban_layer';
    }
    
    /**
     * Shows or hides the flavor ban note based on layer state
     * @param {boolean} checked - Whether flavor ban layer is active
     */
    function handleFlavorBanLayer(checked) {
      var noteDiv = document.getElementById('flavor_ban_note');
      if (!noteDiv) return;
      
      if (checked) {
        noteDiv.style.display = 'block';
        updateFlavorBanLegend(true);
      } else {
        noteDiv.style.display = 'none';
        updateFlavorBanLegend(false);
      }
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates legend specifically for flavor ban layer
     * @param {boolean} show - Whether to show the flavor ban legend
     */
    function updateFlavorBanLegend(show) {
      var legendDiv = document.getElementById('legend');
      if (!legendDiv) return;
      
      if (show) {
        legendDiv.innerHTML = '<div style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; padding: 8px 12px; background: white; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); min-width: 140px;\">' +
          '<div style=\"font-weight:600; font-size:14px; margin-bottom:6px;\">Flavor Ban Status</div>' +
          '<div style=\"display:flex; align-items:center; margin-bottom:3px;\">' +
          '<div style=\"width:15px; height:15px; background-color:#C62828; margin-right:5px;\"></div>' +
          '<span>No Ban (City)</span>' +
          '</div>' +
          '<div style=\"display:flex; align-items:center; margin-bottom:3px;\">' +
          '<div style=\"width:15px; height:15px; background-color:#A5D6A7; margin-right:5px;\"></div>' +
          '<span>Ban Effective (County)</span>' +
          '</div>' +
          '<div style=\"display:flex; align-items:center;\">' +
          '<div style=\"width:15px; height:15px; background-color:#228B22; margin-right:5px;\"></div>' +
          '<span>Ban Effective (City)</span>' +
          '</div>' +
          '</div>';
      }
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates all map layers based on current checkbox states
     * Handles mutual exclusivity between flavor ban and choropleth layers
     */
    function updateLayers() {
      // Check if flavor ban is active
      var flavorBanActive = false;
      var flavorBanCheckbox = document.getElementById('flavor_ban_layer');
      if (flavorBanCheckbox && flavorBanCheckbox.checked) {
        flavorBanActive = true;
        map.addLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('Flavor Ban'));
        handleFlavorBanLayer(true);
      } else if (flavorBanCheckbox) {
        map.removeLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('Flavor Ban'));
        handleFlavorBanLayer(false);
      }
      
      // Check for active choropleth layers
      var activeChoroplethFound = false;
      Object.keys(layerMap).forEach(id => {
        if (id.startsWith('layer_')) {
          var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
          var groupName = layerMap[id];
          
          if (checkbox && checkbox.checked) {
            activeChoroplethFound = true;
            map.addLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup(groupName));
            updateLegend(groupName);
            
            // If flavor ban is active, disable it
            if (flavorBanActive && flavorBanCheckbox) {
              flavorBanCheckbox.checked = false;
              map.removeLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('Flavor Ban'));
              handleFlavorBanLayer(false);
            }
          } else if (checkbox) {
            map.removeLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup(groupName));
          }
        }
      });
      
      // If no choropleth is active and flavor ban isn't either, clear the legend
      if (!activeChoroplethFound && !flavorBanActive) {
        var legendDiv = document.getElementById('legend');
        if (legendDiv) {
          legendDiv.innerHTML = '';
        }
      }
    }
    
    // Track which retailer layer was toggled last
    var lastToggledRetailer = '';
    
    // ---- Set Up Event Listeners ----
    
    // Add change event listeners for all layer checkboxes
    Object.keys(layerMap).forEach(id => {
      var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
      if (!checkbox) return;
      
      checkbox.addEventListener('change', function() {
        if (id === 'all_retailers_layer' || id === 'online_retailers_layer') {
          // Handle retailer layers separately to ensure proper drawing order
          
          // Remove both retailer layers from map
          map.removeLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('All Vape Retailers'));
          map.removeLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('Online Vape Retailers'));
          
          var allCheckbox = document.getElementById('all_retailers_layer');
          var onlineCheckbox = document.getElementById('online_retailers_layer');
          
          // Always add layers in the same order to maintain consistent visibility
          // All retailers first (bottom layer), then online retailers (top layer)
          if (allCheckbox.checked) {
            map.addLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('All Vape Retailers'));
          }
          
          if (onlineCheckbox.checked) {
            map.addLayer(map.layerManager.getLayerGroup('Online Vape Retailers'));
          }
        } else if (isThematicLayer(id)) {
          // For thematic layers, implement exclusive selection
          if (checkbox.checked) {
            // Uncheck all other thematic layers
            Object.keys(layerMap).forEach(otherId => {
              if (otherId !== id && isThematicLayer(otherId)) {
                var otherCheckbox = document.getElementById(otherId);
                if (otherCheckbox && otherCheckbox.checked) {
                  otherCheckbox.checked = false;
                }
              }
            });
          }
          // Update all layers
          updateLayers();
        }
      });
    });
    
    // Initialize layers on map load
    updateLayers();
  }
  ") %>%
  setView(lng = -117.05, lat = 32.95, zoom = 10.3)  # Set initial map view to San Diego area
